overview: After the tragic death of his wife, Jack (Randy Spears), the once flamboyant photographer, now lives life as a recluse. Not speaking, but instead living life through his artwork.  But all that changes when he sees a mysterious woman sunbathing on a nearby rooftop. He becomes obsessed with her. Who is she? Will she help him finally break free of his self-imposed artistic isolation? Sometimes it just takes a little double exposure to rekindle passion...
title: Double Exposure
